analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: Kusalaṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: kusalam citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Akusalaṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: akusalam citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Abyākataṁ cittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nacittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
analyzed: hetuyā terasa ārammaṇe nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate terasa

original: Kusalaṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: kusalam no citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na no citta sahabhū dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Akusalaṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pañca.
analyzed: akusalam no citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na no citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā pañca

original: Abyākataṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nanocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: abyākatam no citta sahabhum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na no citta sahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi

original: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
